thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Ian Altieri
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Ian Altieri

author: Ian Altieri
title: Ian Altieri
text: I have nothing negative to say. We worked with Felicia, and she was great. During our planning phase, she was very approachable and yet did not push. My wife and I were planning our honeymoon, and we thought Costa Rica would be the place do it. We came across Costa Rican Vacations just by internet search and chance. We could not have gone wrong. With a little bit of our input, Felicia planned out an awesome experience. Everything and everyone from the concierge to the hotels, from the shuttle drivers to the tours; were all professional, helpful, and a great experience. Thank you to you and your team for a most memorable honeymoon. The worst part was having to come home... Pura Vida!!
